lines.text: His name was Steve Tuttle - and he reminded everybody of...
[molasses syrup is shown being poured at a breakfast table]
Steve was slow as molasses in winter, so they gave him the nick name of "Lazybones".
Martha Tuttle was one of those mother hens who clucked long after the deed was done.
And this is "Agnes dear"... Her mother - a woman so hard to please, that even her guardian angel fell down on the job...
I'm not going to have that shiftless Lazybones hanging around MY daughter!
My boy ain't lazy... he's just tired from growin' too fast.
Ma says he's a GIRL! She's clever about things like that.
